185621555.review:
the game is great, it has a lot of classic Men Of War mechanics... also, the modding and the mission editor are superb and you can expand the game and having a lot of fun with it.

BUT, the main reason of my negative review are the devs. First of all they completely abandoned this game and secondly they are snowflakes when you criticize a certain corrupt government that is waging a suicidal war at Eastern Europe and they ban you without any warning.

So screw them. I don't have any sympathy for them and their lost political/military cause.

185589658.review: fun game and the mods make it better

185542757.review: I love your game so much! beautiful game and what you guys have done but my only issue has been with the First person POV  or the take control. When using it it tends to bug out in a way where my character would be firing his weapon without me even clicking it, it would  even sometime tab me out of the game and start a new tab from a different application, I have no idea why it does this and it may be from me having it on "advance control settings? or what I be clicking when in use but it is quite common and very inconvenient. And I feel that particular vehicles do not take any damage when fired upon, like T35 takes taking damage from a apache helicopter. Your guys help would be so much appreciated! Thank you

185436075.review: Game is fun don't get me wrong but the AI is awful. In what world is it better to crouch behind cover whilst taking damage ultimately ending in your death, better than standing and returning fire possibly keeping you alive and killing the enemy? AI become cowards and refuse to stand their ground even with better equipment, angle of fire etc. Also when moving troops they seem to refuse to go the direct route instead opting for a longer route which is ALWAYS within enemy troops vision. Just doesn't make any logical sense. Half of it probably is skill related but the games AI is still awful. I've played older games with far superior AI

185336580.review: Игра абсолютно не стоит своих денег. Попытки увлечь аудиторию типо "фишкой" игры от 1-го лица, выливаются в ощущение игры в часть Батлы старых поколений. Про немые миссии за России молчу - тут наверно ударились в политоту. Покупал игру для мода Warfighter, но пощупав игру понял что оно того не стоило. А чтобы авторам было еще более неповадно посоветую игру которая перенаправит всю их аудиторию не что-то стоящее: TOTAL CONFLICT: RESISTANCE - игра РЕАЛЬНО сочетающее аспекты стратегии и шутера одновременно, довольно требовательна к железу и проблемна в оптимизации на ультрах, но оно того стоит если у вас мощный пк, а главное стоит как 2 стакана кофе - в отличии от этого дерьма прошлого поколения за оверпрайз.

184646375.review:
Entramos a la ciudad al amparo de la oscuridad, había mucho ruido, muchos disparos por todos lados, vimos trazadoras pasar por encima y estamos asaltando la ciudad dentro de un vehículo anfibio, con el que viajamos por el desierto, no sabíamos exactamente a dónde nos dirigimos, en mi mente. Quiero decir que solo estamos dando vueltas por la ciudad y eventualmente nos dejaran salir por la rampa. Yo estaba cerca de la puerta, por ende era el primero en salir del vehículo, llega el momento que el sargento da la orden de descender del anfibio, bajo por la rampa e inmediatamente doy medio paso, me tropiezo y caigo sobre mi cara  antes de poder avergonzarme siquiera, ya sabes, como si esta fuera mi gran entrada al combate y caigo de cara, de pronto me pregunto ¿con que me tropecé? sentí que era como un saco de arena o algo similar, de pronto volteo la cabeza y veo un cuerpo de un insurgente muerto. Fue super rapido la experiencia de combate, solo tomó 5 segundos para enfrentar la realidad de combate, ya me enfrente a la muerte. Asique me levante, saque el polvo y me asegure que mi arma estuviera cerca de mi, luego hice lo que todos veníamos a hacer ahí.


Mike Ergo
Marines

184320560.review:
"Call to Arms" - A Hidden Gem for tactical RTS Fans

This game slipped under my radar, but I'm incredibly glad I discovered it. As a fan of classic RTS titles like "Soldiers: Heroes of World War 2" and "Men of War," I was blown away by "Call to Arms." It masterfully blends real-time strategy with intense first-person shooter action, creating a unique and engaging experience. While it might not have received the attention it deserves, "Call to Arms" is a true hidden gem for fans of the genre.

183762147.review: 遇见地狱之门打折了，点进来一看这游戏豪华版现在就卖几十块，刚出那会儿玩的免费版，后来二百多块买的完全版，结果买完之后一点都没有再更新。刚出地狱之门的时候还纳闷为啥我买了季票更新还是没法玩，后来才知道这完全算是俩游戏了。游戏是好游戏，我个人很喜欢玩撤离模式。以前还能遇到野人一起玩，现在一点人也没有的联机大厅有点太沧桑了。

183531311.review: A solid game despite being another cookie-cutter gem engine RTS. I like how it is infantry-focused instead of armor-focused. Don't play it vanilla, its very bland and the animations look terrible for some reason, but with the warfighter mod this game is great even though that mod likes to over complicate some things (The US army doesn't need 50 different infantry squads jesus christ).
